flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=4>>4 more lions each month.
There will be 4*12=<<4*12=84>>84 more lions after 1 year.
There were 148-84=<<148-84=64>>64 lions in Londolozi at first.
#### 64

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 84. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
